text: right Bedford Parish was created as a civil parish in Queens County, Prince Edward Island, Canada, during the 1764-1766 survey of Samuel Holland. It contains the following townships: * Lot 35 * Lot 36 * Lot 37 * Lot 48 * Lot 49 Category:Parishes of Prince Edward Island Category:Geography of Queens County, Prince Edward Island
title: Bedford Parish, Prince Edward Island
